name: Super Alien Blast | ZX Spectrum 48K
description:
Arcade inspired 8-bit alien space shooter action for the 48K ZX Spectrum, emulators, or PC - complete with vintage CRT display simulation. An essential addition to any retro game collection - don't miss out!

Inspired by one of the classic arcade games from the 8-bit era, Super Alien Blast is a modern retro game for the 48K ZX Spectrum, suitable for use with original vintage machines, ZX Spectrum emulators on any operating system, or as a standalone application for PC. The PC version also features a CRT display emulation, complete with phosphor persistence and fully adjustable controls.

  • 48K ZX Spectrum game.
  • 100% Machine code.
  • Use with 48K ZX Spectrum computers, compatibles or emulation.
  • Also runs as a standalone PC game with built-in CRT emulation.

System Requirements - PC Game

  • Windows 7 or newer, or Linux e.g. Ubuntu 20.04LTS.
  • Graphics card with OpenGL support.
  • 64Bit intel or AMD x86-64 compatible CPU.
  • USB Game controller or arcade stick (optional).

Download Contains

  • .tap and .tzx files for 48K ZX Spectrum emulators.
  • Audio file for loading directly into ZX Spectrum computers.
  • Ready-to-run game for Windows or Linux PCs.
